title: Pixel 3A; Notification sound bug
content:
Pixel 3a; Android 11
Greetings.
After the last android update I ran into a very annoying problem with a random notification sound (default one). It happens two to three times per day. I checked the notification log in the settings and its source is not indicated there. I even did a full factory reset  and it didn't help.
Does anyone know how to fix it?
Now I thinking to switching phone because its really frustrating to wake up at night because of random sound.
